Short Course on Power Quality, 13 December 2017
===============================================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Nov 8, 2017 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/Template-Banner-Short-Course-PQ-980x501.jpg)

![template-banner-short-course-pq](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/Template-Banner-Short-Course-PQ.jpg)

The Centre of Electrical Energy Systems (CEES), Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), will be organising a Short Course on Power Quality, with approved continuing professional development (CPD) hours from the Institution of Engineers Malaysia (IEM).

The objectives of the short course are to:

*   Promote better understanding on fundamental concept of Power Quality problems.
*   Share information and experiences regarding Power Quality problems in Malaysia.
*   Provide hands-on session on how to use Power Quality Analyser.

The brochure and registration form for the workshop can be downloaded [here](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/11/Brochure-Short-Course-on-Power-Quality.pdf)
. Kindly book your seat by e-mailing your registration form to Ms. Aisyah (cees@utm.my).
